content.prompt: Which of the following best summarizes the point of this 1842 cartoon about Great Britain's game laws?

choices.label: The game laws should be enforced only by the king.
The punishment for violating the game laws should be enforced more rigorously.
The game laws are unjust and reflect outdated social distinctions.
Enforcement of the game laws protects animals from overhunting.
Poaching game in violation of the law is wrong.
